name: Chicken Tint
description:
Chicken Tint is a funny and casual game for one or two players (for the moment). In this game you have the objective of painting the maximum number of squares in an established period of time.

In the game you will find coins that gives different effects, like go slower, faster, or have a bomb. You will find more about this, in the tutorial inside the game.

You will be able to choose a game time and also the size of the terrain.

When the game is finished the scores will be shown.

This game is for all ages and it is still in development. Also one thing to comment on is that art is totally made by me. I am not that good as a graphic designer, but I have tried my best! I'm searching someone that can help me to improve this aspect.

Native (and recommended) game resolution is 1920 x 1080.

If you have any question or idea please tell me in the comments section. I will work on it as soon as possible.

Thank you and have fun!

-Best regards, Sonikka :)

Special mention:

Music authors: LittleRobotSoundFactory, Tristan_Lohengrin, joshuaempyre, ProjectsU012
